      • handleLogin

        public void handleLogin(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Attempts to login a SoftwareProfile into the application. On success, opens the main-window. Loads a ResourceBundle based on the SoftwareProfile's defaultLanguage.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Interacting with the corresponding button, as defined in Login.fxml.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On failed load of Main.fxml.

      • handleChangeLanguage

        public void handleChangeLanguage(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Change the language of the defaultconfig.properties file and updates the UI. Only affects windows pre-login.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Interacting with the corresponding button, as defined in Login.fxml.
